message.name: ERR_ENT_APPEAL_STAGE_TIME_CONTRAINT_FV_NUMBEROFDAYS_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The number of days must be greater than 0.

message.name: ERR_ENT_APPEAL_STAGE_TIME_CONTRAINT_FV_FROMDATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The from Date must not be in the future.

message.name: ERR_ENT_APPEAL_STAGE_TIME_CONTRAINT_FV_FROMDATE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The from Date must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_ENT_APPEAL_STAGE_TIME_CONTRAINT_FV_CONSTRAINTTYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The constraint type must be supplied.

message.name: ERR_ENT_APPEAL_STAGE_TIME_CONTRAINT_RV_ALREADY_CANCELED
message.locale: The time constraint has already been removed.
